columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the resource.

columns.name: service
columns.description: The Amazon Web Service that owns the resource and is responsible for creating and updating it.

columns.name: owning_account_id
columns.description: The Amazon Web Services account that owns the resource.

columns.name: last_reported_at
columns.description: The date and time that Resource Explorer last queried this resource and updated the index with the latest information about the resource.

columns.name: properties
columns.description: Additional type-specific details about the resource.

columns.name: view_arn
columns.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the view that this table uses to perform the search.

columns.name: query
columns.description: A string that includes keywords and filters that specify the resources to include in the search results.

columns.name: region
columns.description: The AWS Region in which the resource was created and exists.
